name: Automata - Fix (New)
description: Evaluates a candidate's ability to debug and fix code with advanced logic and algorithms. Focuses on problem-solving skills essential for software development.

name: Core Java (Entry Level) (New)
description: Assesses fundamental Java programming skills including syntax, data structures, object-oriented concepts, and basic Java functionality ideal for entry-level positions.

name: Java 8 (New)
description: Tests advanced Java 8 knowledge including lambda expressions, functional interfaces, streams, and modern Java features for experienced developers.

name: Core Java (Advanced Level) (New)
description: Evaluates advanced Java programming skills including multithreading, collections framework, exception handling, and complex problem solving for senior developers.

name: Agile Software Development
description: Assesses knowledge of Agile methodologies, Scrum practices, team collaboration, and iterative development approaches for software professionals.

name: Technology Professional 8.0 Job Focused Assessment
description: Comprehensive assessment for technology professionals that evaluates technical aptitude, problem-solving skills, and IT domain knowledge.

name: Computer Science (New)
description: Evaluates fundamental computer science concepts including algorithms, data structures, computational thinking, and software design principles.

name: Python (Entry Level) (New)
description: Assesses basic Python programming skills including syntax, data types, control flow, functions, and standard libraries for entry-level positions.

name: Python (Advanced Level) (New)
description: Tests advanced Python programming concepts including decorators, generators, advanced data structures, asynchronous programming, and complex problem solving.

name: SQL (New)
description: Evaluates SQL knowledge including query writing, database design, joins, aggregations, and data manipulation for database roles.

name: JavaScript (New)
description: Assesses JavaScript programming skills including DOM manipulation, async programming, ES6 features, and web application development concepts.

name: Entry level Sales 7.1 (International)
description: Evaluates essential sales competencies for entry-level sales professionals including customer focus, communication, and basic sales techniques.

name: Entry Level Sales Sift Out 7.1
description: Screening assessment for entry-level sales candidates that identifies key sales behaviors and attributes for initial candidate filtering.

name: Entry Level Sales Solution
description: Comprehensive assessment for entry-level sales roles evaluating sales aptitude, customer service skills, and fundamental sales competencies.

name: Sales Representative Solution
description: Evaluates sales representative capabilities including prospecting, needs identification, objection handling, closing skills, and relationship building.

name: Sales Support Specialist Solution
description: Assesses skills required for sales support roles including customer service, administrative efficiency, and supporting sales team processes.

name: Technical Sales Associate Solution
description: Evaluates technical sales professionals on product knowledge, solution selling, technical communication, and complex sales processes.

name: SVAR - Spoken English (Indian Accent) (New)
description: Assesses spoken English communication skills with a focus on clarity, fluency, pronunciation, and comprehension for Indian accent speakers.

name: Sales & Service Phone Solution
description: Comprehensive assessment for phone-based sales and customer service roles evaluating communication, problem-solving, and customer engagement skills.

name: Sales & Service Phone Simulation
description: Simulates realistic phone interactions to evaluate candidates' ability to handle customer inquiries, sales opportunities, and service scenarios.

name: English Comprehension (New)
description: Evaluates English reading and understanding capabilities including vocabulary, context analysis, and written communication comprehension.

name: Motivation Questionnaire
description: Assesses workplace motivations, drivers, and preferences to determine role fit and potential job satisfaction factors.

name: OPQ Personality Assessment
description: Comprehensive personality assessment measuring workplace behaviors, preferences, and traits to predict job performance and cultural fit.

name: Coding (New)
description: Hands-on coding assessment evaluating programming ability, problem-solving, code efficiency, and software development practices.

name: Inductive Reasoning Test
description: Measures logical thinking ability and pattern recognition skills essential for problem-solving and strategic roles.

name: Numerical Reasoning Test
description: Assesses ability to analyze and interpret numerical data, graphs, and statistics in work-related contexts.

name: Deductive Reasoning Test
description: Evaluates logical reasoning skills, ability to make sound conclusions from available information, and critical thinking capabilities.

name: Verbal Reasoning Test
description: Measures ability to understand and analyze written information, evaluate arguments, and make logical conclusions from textual data.

name: Data Analyst Solution
description: Comprehensive assessment for data analyst roles evaluating statistical knowledge, data manipulation skills, analytical thinking, and data visualization capabilities.
